data: Sam returned victorious, with an Army List, and the Rectorâ€™s compliments, who would call upon Colonel Sutherland presently, in time to wake up the excellent Colonel, who was a little amazed, and a little amused at himself, to be made aware of that unusual indulgence.
The House on the Moor, v. 2/3
